data.name: Logic Circuit: Marble Puzzle
data.detailed_description:
Logical circuit is a beautiful and colorful puzzles game, where it will make you think about how to form several paths so that each of the balls reach the end where appropriate.

The game has 60 challenges with which you can think and have fun, the difficulty is increasing based on the progress of the challenges.

The objective of the game is to make metal balls fall on the bottom tray, in each tray a certain amount of balls must enter, you can define the path of the balls based on the pieces that you place on the board.

Move the pieces to create a path and get the metal marbles to reach the base of the board, you must make each of the bases fall a corresponding number of marbles.

data.short_description: Marble Puzzle to spend time, where you must fulfill up to 60 challenges! Move the pieces to create a path and get the metal marbles to reach the base of the board, you must make each of the bases fall a corresponding number of marbles.
data.supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel 64 bits - AMD 64 bits
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

Recommended:
